fields.name: link_id
fields.description: Required. Road Link ID. Foreign Key from Road_Link.

fields.name: ref_node_id
fields.description: Required. The From node of the link. Foreign Key from Node.

fields.name: lr
fields.description: Required. Linear Reference of the location, measured as distance along the link from the reference node.  If link_geometry exists, it is used. Otherwise, link geometry is assumed to be a crow-fly distance from A node to B node.

fields.name: x_coord
fields.description: Optional. Either provided, or derived from Link, Ref_Node and LR.

fields.name: y_coord
fields.description: Optional. Either provided, or derived from Link, Ref_Node and LR.

fields.name: loc_type
fields.description: Optional. What it represents (driveway, bus stop, etc.) OpenStreetMap map feature names are recommended.

fields.name: gtfs_stop_id
fields.description: Optional. Foreign Key to GTFS data. For bus stops and transit station entrances, provides a link to the General Transit Feed Specification.
